description: The writer-director Jordan Peele narrates a harrowing sequence from his film.
title: Watch Daniel Kaluuya Face a U.F.O. in ‘Nope’
title_page: Watch Daniel Kaluuya Face a U.F.O. in ‘Nope’ - The New York Times
maintext:
In “Anatomy of a Scene,” we ask directors to reveal the secrets that go into making key scenes in their movies. See new episodes in the series on Fridays. You can also watch our collection of more than 150 videos on YouTube and subscribe to our YouTube channel.
The landscapes are open, the skies are wide and the mood is ominous in this scene from “Nope,” now in theaters.
Here, the lead character, O.J. (Daniel Kaluuya), is arriving at Jupiter’s Claim, an Old West-style theme park near his property, to investigate. He finds the place empty, save a pig on a rooftop and a horse in a cage.
